Name: WC
About the game: The first mode: Hospital. Today, a lot of visitors. Among them there is a small boy with a bladder problem. Suddenly, he longed to the toilet. We'll have to wade through the crowd. Run boy! Run! Second mode: Now, all visitors want to use the toilet! The main thing is not to be mistaken the door. ---------------------
